item.title: K8s Journey 1
item.description: Pods Even though the pods might contain multiple containers, all are running on a single worker node; so, it doesn’t work on multiple worker nodes. Resources Even you have multiple containers within a pod, each container shares the same IP address, port space, and Linux namespaces. So, be careful about port conflicts within a pod. But different pods do not have such a problem, since containers in a pod run in the same Network, not pods in a worker node.
